channel.title: Firewall wan Input should be reject but default was accept
channel.description: Firewall settings wan Input should be set to reject. As installed it was set to accept

item.title: Firewall wan Input should be reject but default was accept
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Yikes! Missed that, thanks for the report, you can manually update until the next release by doing:

wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmoothWAN/SmoothWAN-feeds/main/speedifyconf/net/usr/lib/speedifyconf/run.
sh -O /usr/lib/speedifyconf/run.sh

Read full topic
item.source: Firewall wan Input should be reject but default was accept
